cells.source:
def my_line_chart = line_chart
def my_line_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,:y1]

def output = vega:plot[my_line_chart]

def my_line_chart = line_chart
def my_line_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,{ :y1; :y2 }]

def output = vega:plot[my_line_chart]

def yfield = {(1,:y2);(2,:y1);}

def my_line_chart = chart_config:title["My line chart"]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:template[my_line_chart,line_chart]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,yfield]

def output = vega:plot[my_line_chart]

def yfield = {(1,:y2);(2,:y1);}

def my_line_chart = chart_config:title[:signal,"'My ' + interpolate + ' interpolated line chart'"]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:axes[:bottom,:title,"X-Axis"]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:axes[:left,:title,"Y-Axis"]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:template[my_line_chart,line_chart]
def my_line_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,yfield]

def output = vega:plot[my_line_chart]

def my_bar_chart = chart_config:axes[:bottom,:title,"X-Axis"]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:axes[:left,:title,"Y-Axis"]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:template[my_bar_chart,bar_chart]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,:y1]

def output = vega:plot[my_bar_chart]

def my_bar_chart = chart_config:axes[:bottom,:title,"X-Axis"]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:axes[:left,:title,"Y-Axis"]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:mark[:fill,"blue"]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:width[300]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:height[300]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:template[my_bar_chart,bar_chart]
def my_bar_chart = chart_config:data[mydata,:x,:y1]

def output = vega:plot[my_bar_chart]
